about_the_game:
Build industries that will produce diverse goods. Woodworking, agri-food, mining sector… You'll have to manage a limited supply of resources and optimize production as much as possible to maximize your profits.





Manage logistics lines that transport, merge, or separate resource flows between buildings. To maximize your profits, you'll have to tie up the logistics of your industries properly.





All these industries bring you wealth but you'll have to deal with some issues... Pollution will be your greatest enemy, it destroys the environment, reduces the happiness of your workers and stops certain buildings from working. So be careful, don't destroy yourself.





To unlock all those infrastructures you must maintain an efficient laboratories network, the more you advance in research the more you will unlock tiers and this will allow you to unlock more advanced research.






Your industries will need workers to operate. You will therefore have to assign them and ensure that their happiness remains adequate to avoid revolt.




Are you ready to build great things without destroying yourself?

Colonia is a management game where you have to build a colony. Create industries, trade, manage the population, manage logistics lines, and limit pollution. While serving the interests of the multinational that hires you or earns your right on your colony if you dream of unlimited power.

Recommended:

short_description: In this strategy management game, an evil multinational gave you the mandate to build a colony. Create industries, without destroying the environment, manage logistics, manage population, you'll have to serve its interest. Unless your thirst for power leads you to independence…
